    • Constructor Detail

      • CustomerDatabase

    • Method Detail

      • findRandomId

        public int findRandomId()
        Returns:
        Returns a random 4-digit integer that does not exist as a CustomerID in the database. This integer is to be used as a customer ID

      • generateRandomPassword

        public java.lang.String generateRandomPassword()
        Returns:
        Returns a random 5-letter/digit password. To be used as a starting-password or when a password is reset.

      • regNewCustomer

        public boolean regNewCustomer(Customer newCustomer)
        Parameters:
        newCustomer - - A customer object to be registered in the database
        Returns:
        Registers the Customer object in the database, and creates a payment card for the customer at the same time. Also sends the customer a temporary password on the registered email address

      • getNewCard

        public boolean getNewCard(int cust_id)
        Parameters:
        cust_id - - Id of the customer to generate a new paymentcard for
        Returns:
        Sets the card currently in use by the user as inactive, and creates a new, active card. The balance from the old card is also transferred to the new card.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
